roleset.name: talk about incautiously
roleset.note: BLAB-V NOTES: Frames file for 'blab' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from blab.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: blah blah blah
example.text: Rather than keep the loss a secret from the outside world, Michelle blabs about it to a sandwich man while ordering lunch over the phone.
example.arg: Rather than keep the loss a secret from the outside world
while ordering lunch over the phone
